attacks.name: Fluffy Tag
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. During your next turn, the attacks of that Pokémon do 40 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
